title: Dead Man's Plate, Gnar Interaction.
body:
Dead Mans Plate, is one of Gnar's recommended items on ARAM Howling Abyss. 

Of course the item does not work with Mini Gnar because the items second unique passive is "_(melee only)_"
so i assumed that you would build up momentum in Mini Gnar form, and then expend the momentum as damage and slow on your first auto attack in Mega Gnar form. 

However, the item still expends the accumulated momentum on Mini Gnar's attacks, but of course doesn't apply the slow or damage.

So how are you supposed to use the item on Gnar? _(obviously you're supposed to, as RIOT have listed it as one of his recommended items)_ 

As you are highly unlikely to build up momentum in Mini Gnar form and expend it in Mega Gnar form, as you need to auto attack in order to get into Mega Gnar form, and auto attacking in Mini Gnar form expends the momentum. 

You are also unlikely to build up enough momentum for the item to be useful in mega gnar form, as mega gnar moves very slowly, and doesn't last long enough._ (plus if you're walking the distance required to get max momentum while in mega gnar form, without attacking anything anything... you're doing it wrong.)_

You're also unlikely to build up enough momentum in the few seconds between your last auto attack, and the transformation into Mega gnar.

So this means you cannot use the item's full passive in either of Gnar's two forms.

____________

Which can only mean one of three things:

**1.** The recommended items are wrong, and should be changed.

**2.** The item's passive is not functioning correctly, _(perhaps it's not supposed to discharge momentum on ranged auto attacks... although this sounds too OP)
_

**3.** This is not how you are supposed to be using the item on Gnar, _(i don't see any other way of using it... but if this is the case, can someone please tell me what the correct way of using Dead Man's plate on Gnar is.)_


{{champion:150}} {{item:3742}}

replies.body: Vouching for option 1, Randuins and Sunfire are just outright better on Gnar than Dead Mans.

Straight off the wiki

>On ranged champions, CRUSHING BLOW cannot deal damage, nor Slow icon slow. However, Momentum will still discharge on on-hit.

Basically, it will give you the move speed, but using the momentum before Mega Gnar means you will not do extra damage/slow

Not sure why it's in the suggested, someone at rito needs to do some explaining.
